doc:
Nita Naldi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nita_Naldi 0 Nita Naldi (born Mary Nonna Dooley, November 13, 1894 – February 17, 1961) was an American stage performer and silent film actress. She was often cast in theatrical and screen productions as a “vamp” or femme fatale, a persona first popularized by actress Theda Bara. Nita_Naldi ( born Mary_Nonna_Dooley , November_13_,_1894 – February_17_,_1961 ) was an_American_stage_performer and silent_film_actress . She was_often_cast in theatrical_and_screen_productions as a_“_vamp ” or femme_fatale , a_persona first_popularized by actress_Theda_Bara .
